long_description:
Requires a CONNECTION_DS1074Z node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible DS1000Z oscilloscopes
short_description: Controls the function generator, AKA 'Source' 1 and 2.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DS1074Z node).

parameters.name: source_on
parameters.description: Turn the wavefunction generator on (True) or off (False.)

parameters.name: align_phases
parameters.description: Align the phases of source 1 and 2 (use after both phases are set).

parameters.name: voltage_offset
parameters.description: The vertical voltage offset, in V.

parameters.name: ramp_symmetry
parameters.description: The symmetry of the ramp wavefunction, if used. 0-100%.

parameters.name: duty_cycle
parameters.description: The duty cycle of the pulse wavefunction, if used. 0-100%.
